verses.name: Matthew 4:8
verses.text: Again, the devil taketh him up into an exceeding high mountain, and sheweth him all the kingdoms of the world, and the glory of them;

verses.name: Matthew 4:9
verses.text: And saith unto him, All these things will I give thee, if thou wilt fall down and worship me.

verses.name: Matthew 4:10
verses.text: Then saith Jesus unto him, Get thee hence, Satan: for it is written, Thou shalt worship the Lord thy God, and him only shalt thou serve.

verses.name: Matthew 4:11
verses.text: Then the devil leaveth him, and, behold, angels came and ministered unto him.

verses.name: Matthew 4:12
verses.text: Now when Jesus had heard that John was cast into prison, he departed into Galilee;
